edu.utsa.mobbed

Class Events

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utsa.mobbed.Events

  • public class Events
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class for EVENTS table. Event entities have a name, a starting time, and an ending time. Each event is associated with a particular target entity.
    Author:
    Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

      Creates a Events object.

        public Events(java.sql.Connection dbCon)

    • Method Detail

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(java.lang.String path,
                java.lang.Double[] numericValues,
                java.lang.String[] values)
                  throws MobbedException
        Add the attribute to a batch.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the attribute
        numericValues - the numeric values of the attribute
        values - the string values of the attribute
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • addEvents

        public void addEvents(boolean original)
               throws MobbedException
        Adds the events to a batch. If working with the EEG modality the original events should be stored prior to storing the events that are derived from them.
        Parameters:
        original - true if the events are original, false if the events are derived
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • addNewTypes

        public java.lang.String[] addNewTypes()
                               throws MobbedException
        Adds a new event type if it does not already exist. Event types should be reused when storing datasets that have event types with the same meaning.
        Returns:
        the UUIDs of the event types
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • initializeEventMap

        public void initializeEventMap()
        Initializes the eventMap field that maps the event positions to the event uuids.

      • reset

        public void reset(java.lang.String datasetUuid,
         double[] startTimes,
         double[] endTimes,
         long[] originalPositions,
         long[] positions,
         double[] certainties,
         java.lang.String[] uniqueTypes,
         java.lang.String[] types,
         java.lang.String[] existingEventTypeUuids,
         java.lang.String[][] eventTypeTags)
           throws MobbedException
        Sets class fields of a Events object.
        Parameters:
        datasetUuid - the UUID of the dataset associated with the events
        startTimes - the start times of the events
        endTimes - the end times of the events
        originalPositions - the original positions of the events
        positions - the positions of the events
        certainties - the certainties of the events
        uniqueTypes - the unique event types
        types - all of the event types
        existingEventTypeUuids - the UUIDs of the event types that will be reused
        eventTypeTags - the tags that are associated with the event types
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • save

        public void save()
          throws MobbedException
        Saves all events as a batch. All events in the batch will be successfully written or the operation will be aborted.
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs
